description: The laboratory of Dr. Hogback inside the Thriller Bark mansion, where he conducts his zombie experiments. In this episode, it serves as the initial battleground for Zoro and Ryuma's duel.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Ryuma Duel Location
keyEvents.description: The laboratory serves as the initial battleground for the intense sword duel between Zoro and Ryuma.
keyEvents.significance: The starting point of one of Zoro's most important battles in the Thriller Bark arc.

keyEvents.title: Laboratory Destroyed
keyEvents.description: The fierce exchanges between Zoro and Ryuma completely destroy the laboratory, forcing them to move to the roof.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the intensity and destructive power of the duel.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory was operational for Hogback's experiments
Destroyed during Zoro and Ryuma's battle

name.japanese: スリラーバーク屋敷の屋根

description: The rooftop of the Thriller Bark mansion where Zoro and Ryuma conclude their epic sword duel under the moonlight after the laboratory is destroyed.

keyEvents.title: Rooftop Duel
keyEvents.description: Zoro and Ryuma continue their sword fight on the mansion roof, creating one of the most iconic battle settings in the arc.
keyEvents.significance: The dramatic rooftop setting adds to the epicness of this legendary duel.

keyEvents.title: Hiryu: Kaen Debut Location
keyEvents.description: The roof serves as the stage for Zoro's debut of his Hiryu: Kaen technique.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of Zoro's most iconic techniques is first used.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Victory Over Ryuma
keyEvents.description: The rooftop witnesses Zoro's victory over the legendary samurai Ryuma.
keyEvents.significance: The site of a decisive moment in Zoro's growth as a swordsman.

keyEvents.title: Shusui Transfer
keyEvents.description: Ryuma passes the legendary blade Shusui to Zoro on the rooftop.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Zoro receives one of the most important swords in his arsenal.

statusHistory.reason: First appeared as battle location and remains intact
